title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4406.2 - Minimum payoff
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4406.2 - Minimum payoff

State Regulations

No less than $2.10 shall be paid for the redemption of a
valid $2 winning ticket and no less than $3.15 shall be paid for the redemption
of a valid $3 winning ticket. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4406.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
